narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Aspire Community Services is a Counselor, Mental Health provider based in Glendale, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $36.8M in Medicaid payments across 19K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $36.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
